application.summary: photo collection management and photo editing

description.p: Fotoxx is a photo collection managment application that allows you to import photos from either your digital camera, or from your computer. Once imported, the photos are presented in thumbnail views of varying sizes or a single image view that allows you to then view the next image. Fotoxx also has a wide range of photo correction and manipulation features, including: tweaking brightness, color and contrast, rotating and skewing, and other image effects like embossing and HDR effects.
